abn1: You cannot make page names in uppercase.
abn2: You can use HTML tags in template properties description.
abn3: On the Prod to publish page just put it in the workflow.
abn4: You cannot style title in property and even in title component.
quote1: Worry is a misuse of imagination.
quote2: The best way out is always through.
quote3: If you dont risk anything, you risk even more.
quote4: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.
quote5: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden
quote6: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.
quote8: Quality is not an act its a habit.

quote10: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
quote11: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quote13: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quote14: Believe you can and youre halfway there.
